label: Which pieces are valued around 3 points each?

choices.value: The Queen, but only when you have two or more.
The king is under pressure of an opposing piece and its player cannot alieviate the pressure with one move only.
The king cannot move beause it is surrounded by other pieces.
One player gave up and forfeited.
Each player is unable to move.

label: Which of the following is NOT a way for a player to get out of check?

choices.value: Move the king away from danger.
Impose a piece in the path of danger.
Castle the King and the Rook.
Capture the piece pressuring the king.

label: How many squares are on a standard chess gameboard?

choices.value: A pawn forks two higher valued pieces.
A bishop pressures one of the longest diagonals on the board.
The King castled on the queen side.
A pawn reached the other side of the board.
